message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is significantly below its value. Could you do $17,000?
Hi Alice, I understand the product has value, but $17,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
